deploy.startCommand: echo '=== DEBUG ===' && ls -la /app/library/ 2>&1 || echo 'No /app/library dir' && ls -la /app/config/ 2>&1 || echo 'Empty /app/config' && mkdir -p /app/config /app/cache && if [ ! -f /app/config/metadata.db ] && [ -f /app/library/metadata.db ]; then echo 'Copying metadata.db...' && cp /app/library/metadata.db /app/config/metadata.db && echo 'Done copying'; else echo 'Skip copy: config exists or library missing'; fi && ls -la /app/config/ && python cps.py
